name: Missile Command (itch) (Arĥimedeς ℳontegasppα)
description:
This game is a re-implementation of Atari’s Missile Command in TIC-80. You need TIC-80 in order to play or edit the game.

  • Button B (X key) to start or reset
  • Mouse move the aim
  • Left click or Button A (Z key) to shoot

Be watchful! It scales extremely fast from one level to another.

Palette 1a1c2c5d275db13e53ef7d57ffcd75a7f07038b76425717929366f3b5dc941a6f673eff7f4f4f494b0c2566c86333c57

This is the TIC-80 default palette, called Sweetie 16.
